review: I am thoroughly enjoying the Fire TV stick.  I would have liked detailed instructions on how to use it.  I had to find a young person to teach me!
author: JOANNE RAWSON

review: The fire stick was easy to set up, and easy to get going.
author: Ted C. Brown

review: A great value for Amazon Prime members.
author: Bernard Diggins

review: It doesn't stream as well as my laptop or our Blu-Ray player, but it still really good for the bandwidth we have.  Hard to figure out how to use Hulu and Netflix at first.  Maybe add that to start up directions? I have recommended this to others.
author: Amazon Customer

review: A not-bad product, but still have a along way to go from satisfying.1. YouTube Live streaming is not available. (Said not available on this device when I tried to stream a show)2. Prime Instant movies are not too many, and updated too slow.3. Must need A/C adapter, USB power not enough, technical issue.Except for above, I like this product. Hope it can be better.
author: Xi Yang
